title: Does holy water cure autism?
description: Answer (1 of 9): Sometimes I cannot tell if these are serious questions or facetious. ... As I am not Catholic, but understand the symbolism behind "holy water"; I would say there is no cure for one's ailments, disabilities, or diseases unless allowed by God.
